lead_paragraph: A winterish aspect has been put on by the weather in Pennsylvania. At Harrisburg, ?? and ice were formed in the early part of the week. The nights are cool enough everywhere in the North for outside woollens. Steamboat building is carried on to a creditable extent at Pittsburgh.
